Summary Note:
The RM first met Andrea María Gómez at a wine tasting event in Madrid. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Andrea María Gómez is a seasoned professional with over 23 years of experience.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Andrea María Gómez is currently widowed. She has 1 kid called Clara.
Education Background:
Andrea finished secondary school at IES Vicente Aleixandre Santander in 1997.
Andrea graduated from Escuela de Negocios de Navarra in 2002, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
Andrea María Gómez is a seasoned professional with over 23 years of experience.
Andrea María Gómez launched her career as a Family Office Manager at BBVA S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2002 to 2006.
She then transitioned to CaixaBank S.A. as a Investment Director, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2008 till now.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 260000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She owns 3 exceptional properties: townhouse located in Granada, valued at approximately 1,074,000.00 EUR, condo located in Barcelona, valued at approximately 683,000.00 EUR, flat located in Seville, valued at approximately 710,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Granada, Barcelona and Seville.

In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 2070000 EUR from her late mother, a renowned Stock Trader, in 2008.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
